category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
LORD JESUS, MY GREAT HIGH PRIEST,

You've opened up a new and real way
for someone like me, with all my flaws, to come to You and be accepted.
Help me to really think about who You are,
the perfection of Your sacrifice,
and how powerful it is that You're always speaking to God for me.

It's such an amazing blessing to be close to You.
When I'm exhausted by my struggles,
eaten up by worries,
disturbed by fear,
and weighed down by my weaknesses,
I can come to You with everything I need
and feel a peace that I can't even explain.

The same grace that first saved me is the grace I still need to keep me going,
to lead me, guard me, provide for me, and help me.
And the stories of Your followers give me hope;
they were once spiritually poor and now they're rich in You,
they were trapped and now they're free,
they were tested and now they're victorious.

Every new challenge I face requires more grace than I have on my own,
but never more than I can find in You—the one who has it all.
I come to You for grace on top of grace,
until every empty space that sin has created in me is filled up,
and I am filled completely with You.

Let my desires grow bigger and my hopes become bolder,
so I can honor You by depending on You for everything
and by expecting great things from You.

Be with me, and prepare me for all of it—
the good times and the bad times,
losing things I own,
the death of friends,
the dark days,
all the changes in life,
and for that final, great change.

May I always find that Your grace is enough for whatever I need.
